channel.title: Need help with changing stats! [PI]
channel.description:
Before anyone says go into item.cfg and then tells me the format dont waste your time. I did that, compiled it, restarted server, relogged in, no change!
[code]
item = 15179 Ultimate_Whip A_Whip_from_another_dimension! 0 0 0 175 176 79 23 11 35 37 32 9 7 123 19 [/code]
No change in it at all. I am using team nex server and client. Just as a base!
The compiler
[code]
@echo off :build cls "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\clip\*.java src\server\clip\region\*.java pause [/code]
No compiling errors, it just wont change the stats!

item.title: Need help with changing stats! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Did you check to make sure that Item ID isnt already in use? ;o

item.title: Need help with changing stats! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I hope your realise that you donâ€™t have to compile a .cfg, as your compiler changes .java files into .class files.

Edit: Can you post another line from your Item.cfg?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with changing stats! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

Before anyone says go into item.cfg and then tells me the format dont waste your time. I did that, compiled it, restarted server, relogged in, no change!


item = 15179	Ultimate_Whip	A_Whip_from_another_dimension!	0	0	0	175	176	79	23	11	35	37	32	9	7	123	19

No change in it at all. I am using team nex server and client. Just as a base!

The compiler


@echo off
:build
cls
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\clip\*.java src\server\clip\region\*.java
pause

No compiling errors, it just wont change the stats!

Read full topic
